title: RPOVIG Men's Workout Shorts Sets 5 Pack with Zippered Pockets Basketball Gym Activewear Athletic Mesh Shorts
description: CLEAN & SOFT FABRIC: Our men's mesh shorts are cool wicking shorts that are easy to wash and care for, lightweight and breathable for all your workouts and workouts on scorching weather.

DESIGNED FOR WORKOUTS: The mens workouts shorts feature an elastic waistband and internal drawstring that suit around the waist with room to move. men's shorts have zipper pockets that his phone & wallet can fit in.

MULTIPLE SITUATION: Men's workout shorts can be used for indoor sports, basketball, soccer, running, cycling, indoor gym, home or everyday casual wear.5-pack of Men's Mesh Shorts Wicking and quick-drying, these shorts keep you comfortable and dry during training.
MEN'S WARDROBE MUST HAVE:Activewear Athletic Mens Gym Shorts With Pockets - 5 Pack can be used as Valentine's Day or holiday gifts for men，such as boyfriends, husbands, fathers, son,etc.

MULTIPLE COLORS: Our breathable sports shorts for men are available in: black, blue, red, dark grey, light grey and other casual colorways to meet a variety of wearing needs. Bright-colors mens athletic shorts can make you more eye-catching and energetic in outdoor sports; when you are working out indoors, dark-colors Mens Running Shorts With Pockets are also a well chose, cool and comfortable at the same time with comfortable and stylish.
